title: What would the world be like without modern technology, like computers and phones? - Quora

response.answer_text: How far back do you want to go? Technology in some form has existed from the time early man figured out that a rock gave him an advantage over the animal he was stalking. If you merely want to go back before the Industrial Revolution, I would give you the same answer I would give the caveman. You lived perfectly fine before technology came about. Now that it is here, you live better. In the future, when technology advances even further, you will live even better… With more and better medicine, machines and food-producing technology comes an easier, better, and especially LONGER life for all.
